editorialNotes.standard: If you can imagine it, you can create it—anything from monolithic towers to cavernous rollercoasters. That’s the idea that sparked a world-building phenomenon in Mojang’s amazing Minecraft. Since the game's release on the App Store, a steady stream of meaningful updates has kept this cube-filled universe fun, fresh and jam-packed with exciting features.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: Will you make it to the end?

editorialNotes.standard: The infection has begun and it’s up to you to strategically spread and evolve a deadly plague to bring about the end of the human race. Saving the world and being a hero is honourable, but decimating the world with a deadly infection is a whole lot of fun — even though it shouldn’t be.
The latest in this gorgeous, long-running tower defence series adds cool twists, like playing with two heroes at once.
Catchy music, incredible combo-filled combat, co-op play and a blast of nostalgic spirit ensures this classic brawling series still packs a punch.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: From the creator of Plague Inc.

editorialNotes.standard: After a long day at work, it’s bath time! But Swampy’s shower is broken and he needs your help to guide the water to him. Navigate a path through the dirt past contraptions and obstacles to get every drop to fill the bath.

Tiny Wings has been a longtime favorite of ours, thanks to its gentle vibe, fantastic music, and surprisingly awesome one-touch gameplay. Outrunning the sun across procedurally generated islands is rewarding and relaxing, and we love the added challenge of the four-bird race mode. The game’s vivid, vibrant colors absolutely dazzle on Apple TV—we feel like we’re meeting our flightless friends for the first time again.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Roll the Dice, Pass Go & Win

editorialNotes.standard: Being able to write computer code is a supremely useful talent, but learning the basics can be a tough, tedious slog. Human Resource Machine wraps computer logic fundamentals inside a wonderful, whimsical puzzle game, full of cartoon conveyer belts and demanding managers. It’s so much fun you might not realise how much knowledge you’re soaking up.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: This dungeon isn’t going to clear itself! Sling spells to catchy chiptune beats in a fast-paced top-down roguelike that’s best with friends.

Everyone needs a task manager – and this Apple Design Award winner is adaptable enough for anyone. Organising items is as simple as dragging them where you want them, and the Magic Plus button makes it easy to add to-dos from anywhere in the app.

editorialNotes.tagline: Team up to solve the puzzles

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Frequent/Intense Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Smartly positioning fighters in this roguelike deckbuilder helps the gameplay shine as brightly as the flame you’re tasked with defending.

Build the perfect commute on your next commute with the hypnotic Mini Metro. Strategy buffs and casual gamers alike will enjoy expanding a busy transit system by linking stations, directing trains and upgrading lines. There’s a thrilling satisfaction in seeing underground lines come together—and since no two games play alike, we’re always trying out new designs.
editorialNotes.short: Construct the perfect commute in this underground masterpiece.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: It’s one thing to say you’d never take a bribe: It’s quite another when your options are taking one or missing rent or going hungry. That’s but a taste of the moral quandaries in Papers, Please, which puts you in the shoes of a border checkpoint agent in a fictional 1980s nation. Learning to master passport processing skills, avoiding fines, and making the most of your paycheck is uniquely satisfying and provocative in a way few games manage to achieve. This celebrated indie gem teaches us as much about empathy as it does time management.

name: 仙劍奇俠傳1 DOS懷舊版
Ticket to Ride® The Board Game

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.tagline: Put an end to the terror

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: A story of beauty and illusion

editorialNotes.standard: We couldn’t wait to go back to the land of twisty towers and uncanny beauty—and this sequel didn’t let us down. With its striking colours and level design, it’s even more stunning than the first game. New elements like light beams and controlling two characters make the puzzles even trickier. The bond between that mother and child is what we’ll remember most, though—their relationship moved us in a way few games do.
editorialNotes.short: An unforgettable adventure full of challenging puzzles and gorgeous visuals.

editorialNotes.standard: Limbo is a gripping blend of stark, haunting landscapes, bizarre characters and unsettling sounds. With clever puzzle design, an intriguing narrative and an excellent touch-screen control system, it’s as rewarding to play as it is interesting to look at and listen to.
editorialNotes.short: Dark, haunting, beautiful. This'll stay with you long after it's over.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.short: In a dystopian sci-fi future, a voiceless singer takes up the game’s titular sword to take down an evil conspiracy.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Save the town. Find the truth.

editorialNotes.standard: Talk about using your head! Gain the powers of skeletal warriors by swapping your skull with theirs in this challenging 2D action game.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: A story about love and life

editorialNotes.standard: Mash through waves of foes as a heavily armed potato in this spud-tacular arena survival game.
